short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A US 'English' to actual English converter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anglify translates American English into actual English.
Spiffing.

Born out of a frustration with the overzealous use of the letter z, pronounced 'zed', by our cousins across the pond.  Anglify looks for any words that have been 'Americanised' and restores them to proper working order faster than you can put a brew on.
